title: The unrequited love of God is a bigger tragedy than a billion hells filled with suffering
author: joshualinog
labels: Foolish gospel | Messiah failed | weakness of God
excerpt: It is a deeper cut it is a bigger wound. The love of God rejected. The love of God unattended and unknown. The great massive love of God called nothing and treated like nothing. A lover as big as God
content: It is a deeper cut it is a bigger wound. The love of God rejected. The love of God unattended and unknown. The great massive love of God called nothing and treated like nothing. A lover as big as God completely abandoned and thrown away.
